SvcCatalogCategoryItem.name: SvcCatalogCategoryItem
SvcCatalogCategoryItem.description: Represents an association between a Service Catalog item and category. Service catalog items can be grouped into categories.

IsPrimaryCategory.description: Specifies whether the category is the primary category for a catalog item.

SortOrder.description: Controls the order in which catalog items appear by default when you're viewing all items in a single category.

SvcCatalogCategoryId.description: ID of the category for which the service category item belongs.

SvcCatalogItemDefId.description: ID of the service category item definition.
